languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, объединенный корпус сил Эксплораторов и ополченческих войск готов начать атаку на еретиков, захвативших Ефрат-II. Командиры вооруженных сил корпуса признают санкцию Лорд-инквизитора и готовы уступить вам право верховного командования. Они просят вас созвать военный совет, где будет утвержден план нападения. Что прикажете им ответить?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, объединенный корпус сил Эксплораторов и ополченческих войск готов начать атаку на еретиков, захвативших Ефрат-II. Командиры вооруженных сил корпуса признают санкцию Лорд-инквизитора и готовы уступить вам право верховного командования. Они просят вас созвать военный совет, где будет сформулирован план нападения. Что прикажете им ответить?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, объединенный корпус сил Эксплораторов и ополченческих войск готов начать атаку на еретиков, захвативших Ефрат-II. Командиры вооруженных сил корпуса признают санкцию Лорд-инквизитора и готовы уступить вам право верховного командования. Они просят вас созвать военный совет, где будет утвержден план нападения. Что прикажете им ответить?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of Explorators and militia forces is ready to begin the attack on heretics who took over Eufrates II. Corps's commanders admit the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and are ready to cede the right of supreme command to you. They are asking you to summon the council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. What do you want me to answer them?"

"Lord Captain, the united corps of Explorators and militia forces is ready to begin the attack on heretics who took over Eufrates II. Corps's commanders admit the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and are ready to cede the right of supreme command to you. They are asking you to summon the council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. What do you want me to answer them?"

"Lord Captain, the united corps of Explorators and militia forces are ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The corps's commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They are asking you to summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. What should I tell them?"

"Lord Captain, the united corps of Explorators and militia forces are ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The corps's commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They are asking you to summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. What should I tell them?"

"Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

languages.text: “舰长大人，开拓者与义勇军联合部队已经做好了准备，即将对欧夫拉茨二号星的异端分子发动攻击。军团的指挥官承认了大审判官的授权，同意将最高指挥权转交给您。他们要求您召集军事会议来制定进攻计划，我该如何答复他们？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，开拓者与义勇军联合部队已经做好了准备，即将对欧夫拉茨二号星的异端分子发动攻击。军团的指挥官承认了大审判官的授权，同意将最高指挥权转交给您。他们要求您召集军事会议来制定进攻计划，我该如何答复他们？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les forces combinées des Explorators et de la milice sont prêtes à attaquer les hérétiques qui se sont emparés d'Euphrate-II. Leurs officiers reconnaissent l'autorité du seigneur inquisiteur et acceptent de vous céder le commandement des troupes. Ils vous demandent de convoquer un conseil de guerre afin d'établir un plan d'attaque. Qu'allons-nous leur répondre ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les forces combinées des Explorators et de la milice sont prêtes à attaquer les hérétiques qui se sont emparés d'Euphrate-II. Leurs officiers reconnaissent l'autorité du seigneur inquisiteur et acceptent de vous céder le commandement des troupes. Ils vous demandent de convoquer un conseil de guerre afin d'établir un plan d'attaque. Qu'allons-nous leur répondre ? »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, das vereinte Korps der Exploratoren und der Miliztruppen ist bereit, die Ketzer anzugreifen, die Eufrates II übernommen haben. Die Kommandanten erkennen die Sanktionierung durch den Großinquisitor an und erklären sich bereit, das Oberkommando an Euch abzutreten. Sie bitten Euch, einen Kriegsrat einzuberufen, um einen Angriffsplan zu entwickeln. Wie sollen wir reagieren?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, das vereinte Korps der Exploratoren und der Miliztruppen ist bereit, die Ketzer anzugreifen, die Eufrates II übernommen haben. Die Kommandanten erkennen die Sanktionierung durch den Großinquisitor an und erklären sich bereit, das Oberkommando an Euch abzutreten. Sie bitten Euch, einen Kriegsrat einzuberufen, um einen Angriffsplan zu entwickeln. Wie sollen wir reagieren?"

"Lord Captain, das vereinte Korps der Exploratoren und der Milizentruppen ist bereit, die Ketzer anzugreifen, die Eufrates II übernommen haben. Die Kommandanten des Korps erkennen die Sanktionierung durch den Großinquisitor an und erklären sich bereit, das Oberkommando an Euch abzutreten. Sie bitten Euch, einen Kriegsrat einzuberufen, um einen Angriffsplan zu entwickeln. Was soll ich ihnen entgegnen?"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, las tropas milicianas y de Exploradores están listas para atacar a los herejes que ocuparon Eufrates II. Sus comandantes aceptan la sanción del Lord Inquisidor y acceden a que sea usted quien tome el mando absoluto. Le piden que convoque un consejo de guerra para establecer un plan de ataque. ¿Qué respondemos?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, las tropas milicianas y de Exploradores están listas para atacar a los herejes que ocuparon Eufrates II. Sus comandantes aceptan la sanción del Lord Inquisidor y acceden a que sea usted quien tome el mando absoluto. Le piden que convoque un consejo de guerra para establecer un plan de ataque. ¿Qué respondemos?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、探索者団と民兵による連合軍団は、ユーフラテス・IIを占拠した異端者に対する攻撃の準備が整っております。司令たちはロード・インクィジターの承認を認め、最高指揮権を陛下に譲渡することに同意しています。彼らは、攻撃計画を策定するため、陛下に作戦会議の招集を要請しております。いかがご返答いたしましょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、探索者団と民兵による連合軍団は、ユーフラテス・IIを占拠した異端者に対する攻撃の準備が整っております。司令たちはロード・インクィジターの承認を認め、最高指揮権を陛下に譲渡することに同意しています。彼らは、攻撃計画を策定するため、陛下に作戦会議の招集を要請しております。いかがご返答いたしましょうか？」

languages.text: "Keşiftör ve milis birimlerden oluşan birliğimiz, Eufrates II dünyasını işgal eden kâfirlere saldırmaya hazırdır Lord Kaptan. Komutanlar, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun tebliğine uyarak nihai komutayı size devretmeyi kabul etti. Saldırı planını tertip etmek amacıyla savaş konseyi kurmanızı istiyorlar. Nasıl bir yanıt iletelim?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the united corps of the Explorators and the militia forces is ready to attack the heretics who took over Eufrates II. The commanders recognise the Lord Inquisitor's sanction and agree to cede the right of supreme command to you. They ask that you summon a council of war in order to establish the plan of attack. How should we respond?"
